name: Metaverse Garden3
description:
Metaverse Garden is a collection of plants & nature with a new approach to  painting plants and of course with attention to  metaverse technology.
The work technique is Acrylic & digital printing on canvas, size of each work is 21x30 & it is covered with a layer of resin like a glass frame, which indicates the preservation of nature from external destructive factors
According to Sohrab Sepehri(persian poet)
I was left in a garden
the garden air passed me by
and its leaves slipped into my being
